text: Elizabeth Alice "Ali" MacGraw (born April 1, 1939) is a television and movie actress. She started in movies, but changed to stage and TV acting. She received Golden Globes for Goodbye Columbus and Love Story (the earlier was in 1969, and the latter was released in 1970). Some birthdate sources say that she was born in 1938; others say 1939 or 1940. MacGraw was born in New York State. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Ali MacGraw
